name: supersweet-syrup
effect: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.
short_effect: Once per battle, when a Pokémon with Supersweet Syrup enters the battle, it lowers the evasion stat of all adjacent opponents by one stage.
flavor_text: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pokémon by 1 stage when first sent into battle
